title: 10000.Movie.Posters_B
description:
A collection of over 10,000 Movie Posters from the 1960's thru 2000's. Contains a variety of genres not limited to just Hollywood, but also Indie and "foreign". (Actual file count: 11108)

Contains all the files of both the 6000 poster collection from the old isohunt and 5800_Movie_Posters from TPB merged together. Makes for a good screensaver slideshow or mosaic. 

Contains Index.txt file in each folder. In the case of duplicates, the best quality one was kept. Very few of these are poster quality, but the bulk are good enough for hi-res computer displays and Televisions.

Categorized into uncompressed alphabetical segments, organized filenames and merged the two libraries for easy viewing and downloading.

Share and Enjoy!
